titles.title: VA Nurse and Physician Assistant RAISE Act
Department of Veterans Affairs Nurse and Physician Assistant Retention And Income Security Enhancement Act
VA Nurse and Physician Assistant RAISE Act
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rate of pay for certain nurses and other medical positions of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Department of Veterans Affairs Nurse and Physician Assistant Retention and Income Security Enhancement Act or the VA Nurse and Physician Assistant RAISE Act
This bill increases the maximum rate of basic pay for advanced practice nurses, physician assistants, and registered nurses of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
